message: In Pharoahs day, both the Arabs and the Jews were Black Africans. There were never any white people enslaved in Egypt. But there were Black slaves in Egypt. Had there been whites enslaved in Egypt for 400 years, they would have surely documented it. How is it Egyptians documented black slaves; but never showed any white slaves. Because the Israelite slaves of Egypt were themselves Egyptians and Ethiopians and Nubians.
